newsletter: Be part of our club for discounts and offers
product_description: Refinement Chair with Ripped Seat, made of retro Eucalyptus wood, of great resistance, Kiln dried, made with a spike system and painted with P.U. (Polyurethane) With its entire structure painted in wood, it offers a lot of elegance to your environment and when cleaning is very easy, as it is washable and light for movement. Enough of receiving visitors and not having a place to accommodate them. With the chair, your days as a host will be marked by a lot of elegance and sophistication.
